Content.Text:
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. Doesn't it feel great
to wake up early in the morning?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. I love a good morning
flight. <MYNAME>, would you like to fly
with me?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Morning, <MYNAME>. Camellia prepares the
best breakfasts in the world. <MYNAME>,
how about coming over to eat?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you. If you ever want to go on
a trip, feel free to ask me anytime.
<PAGE>
Only when I'm open for business though.
Other days are reserved for precious
time with my family.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Have you seen my dear wife?
She's as pretty as a rose again today,
eh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hawhaw... Is it any wonder I fell in
love with her?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. My daughter is as pretty as
a daisy in bloom, isn't she?
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>She's going to grow up to be a beauty,
just like Camellia.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you. Night flying is like
swimming in a sea of stars and makes you
feel so graceful.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, would you like to come and fly
with me?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. What are you doing up at
this hour?
<PAGE>
I have night duty too. After all, I'm
the knight who protects Camellia and
Hina.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. How are things at work? Of
course, all's well with me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hahaha, I get to fly across the sky,
then come home to the welcoming arms of
my family. It's the perfect life.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm feeling really good today. Why? I
mean, look at this weather.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Blue skies, a nice cool breeze, and
surrounded by green everywhere. How can
you not be moved by that?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, <MYNAME>. Sometimes, flying in
the rain is difficult due to bad
visibility.
<PAGE>
But when you cut through the rain clouds
to beautiful blue sky on the other side,
it's a great feeling.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
It sure is hot on land. It's cold in
high altitude, so the heat hits you when
you get off the plane.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Plane maintenance is
especially important when it's raining.
<PAGE>
Keeping your plane in good condition is
critical to safe flying. You can't be
negligent.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Isn't it great weather?
<PAGE>
On a day like this, I feel like going up
and creating vapor trails with my plane.
What? Childish, you say?
<PAGE>
Hahaha, a man's got to cherish the boy
in him.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you working on the farm?
This rain is a blessing for the crops. I
hope your harvest is bountiful.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm glad it cleared up today. From up
here, you get a great view of the town
covered in snow.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's hard to fly with such poor
visibility. For a pilot, every day is a
battle with the weather.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>. No way I can fly today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>The wind's too strong and even I would
have a hard time at the controls.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, <MYNAME>. No way I can fly today.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>The snow's gonna pile up on the plane.
And I have to sweep it off or the
engine will start acting up.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
By the way, I hear you're in a 
relationship now. Good for you.
<PAGE>
Now work at it, and become a loving
couple like my Camellia and me.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you ever seen the forest from the
sky? It's overflowing with nature and so
pretty. You must see it sometime.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
In many towns, the air isn't clean, but
it seems okay in this area. Moving
here was the right decision.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I'm very grateful to you and Dunhill.
Thank you very much.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good fish is plentiful in this river.
It's close to town, so you can eat fresh
fish anytime.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
If Hina wades into the river, you must
stop her immediately. It would be
horrible if she were swept downstream.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The view from here is amazing. But it's
even more beautiful seen from the sky.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Maybe we can build a villa here. Don't
you think it's a good idea?
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I know, I know. I'm just kidding. We
mustn't let one man's self-indulgence
spoil this beautiful scenery.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why don't you plant your crops so that
they form a picture? My passengers would
love seeing that from the air.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hina is happy too, that there's a
terrific farm like this nearby.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>She'll probably visit again, so please
play with her.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mines are neat places. Precious metal
ores and brawny men come together, here.
<PAGE>
Just as there are adventures in the sky,
you'll probably find one-of-kind
adventures here too.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Mining ore is hard labor. Be careful
that you don't collapse from it.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This town is deserted as usual. Better
work harder or people won't come.
<PAGE>
Well, this is just the start. Do your
best with the farm, will you?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town is really starting to liven
up.
<PAGE>
I think my shop's gonna manage too. It's
all thanks to you, <MYNAME>. I'm very
grateful.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There are lots of people in this town
now. I think it has just the right
balance of people and nature.
<PAGE>
What do you think? Is this pretty close
to the ideal town you had in mind?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My travel agency is different from other
places, don't you think?
<PAGE>
I mean, it's run by me, a first-rate
pilot, and my beautiful and capable
Camellia.
<PAGE>
There's no other place that provides
such good service. We always guarantee
a pleasant journey.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, are you the outdoor type? I
prefer to the outdoors to moping around
in the house.
<PAGE>
Why don't you come camping with my
family sometime? It's sure to be fun.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We pilots get such a thrill from flying,
even when it's work.
<PAGE>
And it's especially exciting when we get
to fly to exotic places.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>So when you decide to take a trip,
choose an unusual place. I want you to
experience that feeling too.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
When work takes me to a foreign country,
I always look for presents for Camellia
and Hina.
<PAGE>
They've got a good eye for things, so
run-of-the-mill presents won't please
them.
<PAGE>
I have such a hard time looking. But
when I see the joy in their faces, it's
always worth the trouble.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Camellia and Hina are my treasures. I
cherish them more than anything and I'll
do anything to protect them.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Camellia's always been popular. Wherever
she goes, men turn back for a second
look.
<PAGE>
I was bitten by love from the moment I
saw her.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I told her I loved her countless times.
She ignored me at first, but my
sincerity finally won her over.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's as though we were friends in
another time.
<PAGE>
You understand how I feel and that makes
me very happy.
<PAGE>
I want you to stay close to me and my
family, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Can I try it? Well then, bon appetit!
<PAGE>
Oh, this is quite good, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Nothing can beat Camellia's pumpkin
doria, but this is delicious. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. That's a nice thing you have
there. It's a present for me?
<PAGE>
You have good taste to choose this for
me, <MYNAME>. Thank you.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? A present for me? Oh, this is just
to my tastes.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I like it. Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Hey, you're an adult. You should know
what passes as a joke and what doesn't.
<PAGE>
Don't disappoint me so much.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Say... Don't tell me you enjoy
tormenting people!
<PAGE>
Humph...Maybe I'm just not a good judge
of character. Or maybe I just trusted
you too much.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Boiled eggs? I was served this once for
breakfast and got into an argument with
Camellia.
<PAGE>
To be honest, I hate boiled eggs. Even
to the point of arguing with my beloved
wife.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is from your farm? You grow amazing
things. May I have this?
<PAGE>
I can just picture how happy Camellia
and Hina will be. Thank you!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is this made of papier mache? You want
me to hold it?
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Whoa, it's heavy! What is this? Is this
for real?! You're giving it to me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You'd think something this big only
appears in fairy tales. Hina will be
overjoyed when I show it to her!

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>. What are you planning to
do with that?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you don't have to do that. You gave
one earlier, remember?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Wow, it's a pumpkin doria! You made it
just for my birthday? Thank you, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm really touched. I'm glad I came to
this town. I'm going to eat it later.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
An angel must be smiling down on me
today.
<PAGE>
I received such wonderful gifts from my
family and friends. Thank you very
much, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I appreciate your thoughtfulness. It's
a birthday present, right? Thank you,
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
But whether it's from man or woman, if I
seem too happy, Camellia might get
jealous of me.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A birthday present? Haha, thank you. I
appreciate it, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
A birthday present? Is this it?
<PAGE>
I thought it couldn't be...but I guess
it is. I hate to be blunt, but I don't
feel good about it.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Just how do you expect me to react when
it's my birthday?!
<PAGE>
You have some nerve giving me such a
thing for my birthday. Just stay away
from me and my family from now on.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
A boiled egg for a birthday present?
Listen, what's the big idea?
<PAGE>
I didn't think you were the type to play
such a joke on me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Not for a moment. Not you, of all
people. But I guess it's not too late
to reconsider how I feel about you.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A birthday present?
<PAGE>
It's so big and nice. I'm going to have
Camellia cook it right away. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're giving me a toy you made for my
birthday?
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hey, this is the real thing! How did
you make it anyway?
<PAGE>
A surprise, huh? I'm really pleased.
Thank you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Chicks, huh? Don't other animals chase
after them? I'm worried for them 'cuz
they seem slow.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Birds that can't fly. I wonder they
have wings?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sh-She's huge. Listen, you really
overfed her.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Ahh, that's the one. The pet that I
want. I envy you because you have a dog.
<PAGE>
My family prefers cats, but I like dogs.
This is one thing I won't budge on.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Even if they're overweight, they sure
are lovable. I've really taken a liking.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A big dog is nice too. Big dogs are
great to look at. I'll bet having one
for a pet is great.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you don't have time to walk her, I'll
be happy to take her.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh, that's too bad. I thought I could
feel like a dog owner for a while.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cats are cute, but I still prefer dogs.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I gueess cats become less adorable when
they gain weight too. Don't you think
that's sad?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A cat, huh? Camellia and Hina love cats
and seem to want one. But I like dogs.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't this cat overweight? If you
consider yourself a good owner, you
have to take better care of it.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's for the Flower Festival? Thank
you, <MYNAME>,
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I got flowers first thing this morning
for Camellia and Hina. I filled the
room with passionate red roses.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know the significance of giving
this today? It's the Pumpkin Festival.
<PAGE>
Well, try giving it to Hina. Thank you,
<MYNAME>.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, I also gave it to her on the day
I asked her to marry me. Of course, I
proposed at the perfect time. 
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You want to know when? Hahaha, I can't
tell you that. If you're serious, you'd
better figure it out for yourself.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A ring, huh... How nostalgic. When I
proposed to Camellia, I bought one too.
<PAGE>
<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hahaha, it took me quite a while to
give her the ring.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
They look like the same bird to me. The
species? Gee, I can't tell.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh yeah, I saw Hina playing wwith it.
Well, I guess she's a gentle animal.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You get to see them a lot in these
parts. I've seen them swimming
gracefully in the ocean.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Today is your birthday, right? Here's a
present for you. Don't be shy. Take it.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
So today is your birthday, eh?
Congratulations, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's you. It gets lonely if you
hardly come around.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Roger that. I'm going to get ready for
take-off.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Huh? Really? You made the effort to
come, so have a great time.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Leave the trip to me. Whether it's a
solo journey or a family trip, I'll fly
anywhere.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Michelle's magic is always amazing, eh?
And she's so popular. My hat's off to
her.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, I'm eating right now. If you need
something, can you come back later?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a red bench. I love the color
red.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Knowing wind direction and wind speed
is critical for a pilot. That's why
weather vanes are so important.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A wagon. Now that's nice. Wouldn't it be
great to take a leisurely trip, swaying
along on a wagon like this?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a great table. It matches this town
perfectly.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a great chair. It looks comfortable
and matches this town too.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A log chair has character. It may not be
as comfortable, but the smell of the
wood is nice.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sitting on a beach chair, gazing out at
the sea must be a great feeling.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A garden umbrella is nice when you're
out taking a stroll and want to rest for
a bit.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Sitting under a beach umbrella, gazing
out at the ocean with a cold drink in
hand...how great is that?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love red brick, and looking at a red
pillar is very soothing to me.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder if it's true that staying close
to a picture of the sun makes you
stronger?
<PAGE>
I'm not getting a sense of that, but
it's all in the mind, right? Anyway,
that felt good.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When all you ride are airplanes, you get
the urge to ride a truck sometimes.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A hammock is handy on a trip. You can
sleep anywhere and it's compact and easy
to fold.
<PAGE>
But you can also doze off and fall, so
be careful.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
An obelisk. I've seen a few in my time,
but I'm shocked to see one in this town.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
People have pretty extravagant things
in this area.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a luxurious-looking place.
Everything goes well together.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This place must be part of an exclusive
residential area. Everything looks so
luxurious.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's a small, but nice yard. And the way
they arranged things is nice.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
You can take your time around here and
it feels so nice.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is a gorgeous garden and it even
has a water fountain.
<PAGE>
It's not easy to put together something
like this.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love red roses. In fact, you could    
call it my trademark.
<PAGE>
So red roses are more than welcome.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love red roses. In fact, you could    
call it my trademark.
<PAGE>
So red roses are more than welcome.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Do you know why bonsai are so great?
<PAGE>
You can create a world of nature on a 
platter, and a very small one at that.
<PAGE>
That's what makes them so fascinating.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A potted cherry tree is small, but
that's what I like about it. I get to
enjoy its flowers indoors too.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Potted plants are great because you can
put them anywhere.
<PAGE>
I can watch the gingko leaves change
color with the seasons in my house.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A red flower basket. Now that's nice. In
any case, red is such a passionate
color.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Circular-shaped plants are fun, don't
you think?

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Palm trees make you feel like you're in
the south seas. They've even got
coconuts.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love flower arches. Especially when
red roses are entwined in it.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love flower arches. Especially when
red roses are entwined in it.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Red fencing is nice. Red is such a
passionate color.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I love red brick, and looking at red
brick fences makes me feel calm somehow.

I'm not going to give you a present
right now.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm used to going to a barber, but I
must say, a hair salon is nice too.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A clothing store is fine, but what'll
look good on me?
<PAGE>
This flight jacket is the one for me.
But it's nice to look at other things
once in a while.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Camellia's cooking is the best, but
eating alone at a restaurant once in a
while is nice.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Thank you for coming to our travel
agency. I appreciate your business.
<PAGE>
I will fly you anywhere you want.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I love tea, so I'm glad there's a tea
shop. But none of that herbal tea stuff
for me.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Moving house is hard work 'cuz there's
so much stuff. With people, I simply
put them on a plane.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
As this town gets bigger, there'll be
more people and our shop will have more
customers.
<PAGE>
...Then maybe, we can afford a new
plane. I can't wait for that.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The town's looking more and more
westernized and makes me want to take a
stroll.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The eastern look around town is nice
too. It's very calming, and I'm sure,
soothing to the soul.

<FACE_GARDNER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I've been all over the world and seen
many things, but this town's going
through a lot of change too.
